publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6249 Hugh Henry: Communication Workers Union Ballot—That the Parliament welcomes the vote of the Communication Workers Union to agree a three-year deal that will give Royal Mail staff a wage rise worth 6.9% and job security; hopes that this will lead to improved industrial relations; recognises the willingness of staff to actually participate in the transformation of a publicly owned Royal Mail, and hopes that early steps will be taken to resolve the issue of the Royal Mail pension debt.
S3M-6249 Communication Workers Union Ballot (lodged on 4 May 2010) Sarah Boyack*

S3M-6249Hugh Henry:Communication Workers Union Ballot—That the Parliament welcomes the vote of the Communication Workers Union to agree a three-year deal that will give Royal Mail staff a wage rise worth 6.9% and job security; hopes that this will lead to improved industrial relations; recognises the willingness of staff to actually participate in the transformation of a publicly owned Royal Mail, and hopes that early steps will be taken to resolve the issue of the Royal Mail pension debt. Supported by: Sarah Boyack
S3M-6249 Communication Workers Union Ballot (lodged on 4 May 2010) Cathy Jamieson*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6249 Communication Workers Union Ballot (lodged on 4 May 2010) Marlyn Glen*
S3M-6249 Communication Workers Union Ballot (lodged on 4 May 2010) Cathy Peattie*
